description:
Momo sneaks into Rito’s bed. Mikan, who wants to catch Momo, sneaks in as well but does not find anything. She does, however, end up staying the night. Rito and Lala pursue a drunk Celine, who spreads her pollen to Yami, which causes her to fall for Rito. Haruna cannot fight her feelings any longer, so she tells Lala that she also likes Rito.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Imouto" Sensen Ijou Ari / Itsuwari no Koi! / Renai Yohou
All Quiet on the "Sister" Front / The False Love? / Predicting Love
À l’Ouest, du nouveau / Amour hypocrite ? / Prévisions amoureuses
「妹」戦線異常アリ / 偽りの恋? / 恋愛予報
